website_summaries.verdict: Recognized for its affordable price and simple construction, this teeter-totter is a must-have for younger children.
pros: Features easy-to-grip handles for little hands
Sturdy build helps children feel secure
cons: Some complaints that rocker has a strong odor at first but goes away quickly

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend! My boys love it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! My boys love it! It already came put together so all we had to do was take it out of the box and let them have it, which is even more amazing!!!!! If you're looking for one definitely check this one out. Very sturdy, plenty of room my 3 year old and 5 year old (which is a big boy) both fit fine on it.
customer_reviews.author: Paigedrewmichaelaj

customer_reviews.title: Love this teeter totter
customer_reviews.text: My two and three year old grandkids love this teeter totter. I love that one can use it by themselves. It came assembled. we pulled it out of the box and used it. It is well made and looks like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: methomas

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this!!
customer_reviews.text: My twins absolutely love this !!!! They have been playing on it since we got it! My niece came over the other day and all 3 of the babies where able to play on it at once.
customer_reviews.author: glamrsshab

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This was a Birthday present for my twin grand children. Their Mother says they took to it straight out of the box and they cry when they have to get off. I'm very pleased with this purchase. Delivery was early. No assembly was required and the price was very reasonable for such a sturdy little tikes product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rock Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for the k ids
customer_reviews.text: This product is a winner. Can be for 1 or 2 kids. 3 kids work but it's harder to get it to rock. The box is also a nice size the kids enjoyed playing with. Very happy with the durability. After 2 months, still intact which is saying alot with my group of kids
customer_reviews.author: CJV

customer_reviews.title: So much fun.
customer_reviews.text: This item made a big hit with both my 1-year old AND 4-year old grandsons. Even though the younger one needs some assistance, he can't get enough of it. The older one is showing him the ropes. It is a lot of fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: A Great Toy that Safe and Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This a toy that can be used inside and outside. 1,2 or 3 children can ride at the same time. Hours and hours of fun for little people!
customer_reviews.author: Minnie Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: No assembly necessary
customer_reviews.text: Loved that it was all one piece. My grandson has a similar one at daycare and loved it for Christmas.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this for two of my grandchildren (ages 3 and 18 months) for Christmas. It was a hit--they love it!

customer_reviews.title: Even the big kids like it
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad i bought this. The kids are having a ball. We use it indoor.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my great grandbaby stage 2 and 3 and they absolutely love it! It's sturdy, but it's light enough that they can take it from room to room themselves. Easy 5-star rating.

product_meta.title: Little Tikes 486098 Classic Whale 3-Rider Teeter Totter Toy with Handles, Blue
product_meta.description: Forget the swim trunks and snorkel gear. Your little ones can fall in love with the water in a whole new way! This Little Tikes Whale Teeter Totter is the perfect place to let their ideas imagination float around them. With a deep blue color and fun whale shape, this 3-person teeter totter rocks back and forth just like a ship on the open ocean. Let them play inside or out and trust that the wavy footholds and handles will keep them safe as they laugh and play. Your little marine biologists can be active with other children on this 3.5-foot children's toy while daydreaming about all the fishes in the sea. The Classic Whale Teeter Totter from Little Tikes is a fun way to teach your kids to cooperate in a group and develop useful motor skills.
feature_bullets: Adorable 3.5-foot, whale-shaped teeter totter toy for up to 3 riders
Help toddlers develop motor skills and team cooperation
Stable base helps kids rock the boat without capsizing
Perfect teeter-totter for indoor or outdoor use
Simple 1-piece design cleans up easily with soap and water

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars176 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
